data.comment: The match has started at Vicarage Road.
Goal! Joao Pedro gives Watford a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 17, Goal! Watford increase their lead to 2-0 through a well-placed header from Tom Cleverley.
Christian Kabasele (Watford) has received a first yellow card.
Blackburn are back in the match in Watford. Ben Brereton has scored to make it 2-1.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
It's now 3-1 thanks to an own goal from Darragh Lenihan.
In the minute 61, Etienne Capoue is replacing Tom Cleverley for Watford at Vicarage Road.
The away team have replaced Daniel Ayala with Scott Wharton. This is the first substitution made today by Tony Mowbray.
Blackburn have been given a penalty...
In the minute 70, Tony Mowbray is making the team's second substitution at Vicarage Road with Tom Trybull replacing Corry Evans.
The home team replace Kiko Femenia with Jeremy Ngakia.
Blackburn make their third substitution with Tyrhys Dolan replacing Ben Brereton.
In the minute 82, At Vicarage Road, Jeremy Ngakia has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Domingos Quina is replacing Ismaila Sarr for the home team.
Joao Pedro (Watford) gets a yellow card.
